Name: PUZZLETIME: Lovely Girls
About the game: PUZZLETIME: Lovely Girls is a classic jigsaw puzzle game in which you need to assemble an image-scene with one of the beautiful girls from many details. The game allows you to relax for an exciting gameplay and get to know the life of 5 beauties during 20 puzzle-scenes. Features: 5 beautiful girls 20 puzzles Openable Image Gallery Achievements Cards (badges, backgrounds, emoticons) (Soon) Steam Cloud
